title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Individualized Social Skills Improvement Program for Employees with Intellectual Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Social Skills and Mastery of Fundamental Daily Living Functions
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners will be able to perform basic interpersonal skills (eye contact, handshakes, etc.) required in the workplace with 80% accuracy within 8 weeks.
Learners will be able to utilize a 3-step conflict resolution strategy (stop-think-request) through role-playing activities during conflict situations.
Learners will sustain social skills practice using mobile learning materials at least 3 times per week and achieve at least 50% improvement in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
